statements: DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND location = 'Room A';
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE reading_time < '2022-01-01' OR reading_value > 50;
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 10 AND reading > 50
DELETE FROM maintenance_log WHERE maintenance_type = 'Calibration' AND sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor')
DELETE FROM maintenance_records WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' AND reading > 100
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE machine_id = 101 AND alert_type = 'Critical';
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE log_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
